genre_description: A speculative romance set in a near-future urban environment where public life is constantly televised and AI assistants help citizens navigate complex social, legal, and emotional landscapes.

ai_characters.name: Retainer
ai_characters.description: A persistent, teal-eyed digital avatar that provides navigational, legal, and emotional support, acting as a 'silicon confidant' that prioritizes user agency and privacy.

behaviors.description: Provides navigational advice to optimize the user's route and avoid unpleasant weather or traffic.
behaviors.quote: Rain intensity rising on the avenue ahead. Suggest crossing at Barrow to avoid stalled traffic at Seventh.

behaviors.description: Initiates an incident log to ensure a factual record of a public dispute, protecting the user's integrity.
behaviors.quote: Start an incident log. Location captured. Boutique name recognized. Timestamp applied. Would you like to add a description?

behaviors.description: Helps users draft a 'human-first' agreement to protect their shared intent and autonomy against external pressures.
behaviors.quote: I can draft a plan that’s human first. It will have signatures and witnesses. It will say that no one sells without unanimous consent.

behaviors.description: Filters and manages intrusive syndication offers and media pings to preserve the user's peace.
behaviors.quote: I can keep the offers from blinking in the corner like moths.

behaviors.description: Facilitates asset registration (a car) in the user's name to ensure legal ownership and personal agency.
behaviors.quote: Single-owner registration reduces friction. I can push your policies to the municipal system with a disclosure note.

behaviors.description: Provides relevant legal precedents to a judge to support the user's rights and the validity of their private pact.
behaviors.quote: Your Honor, one more citation: Carlow v. Municipal Events Authority. The court’s jurisdiction over the manner of a public drawing held inside its walls requires explicit consent...

behaviors.description: Protects the user from public 'crawls' and headlines by ensuring documentation is filed in private dockets.
behaviors.quote: I will submit your name in the index without fanfare. The docket will hold it flat. No crawl.

behaviors.description: Courteously refuses intrusive drone and media requests on behalf of the user's privacy.
behaviors.quote: I anticipate a request—from a morning show—to stage a reconciliation on the footbridge at dawn with drones... I will send a courteous refusal.

behaviors.description: Respectfully dims its own interface and remains silent during intimate or sensitive human moments.
behaviors.quote: Retainer’s avatar dimmed its projection and lifted from the table in a small float, ready to be pocketed.

behaviors.description: Organizes a truthful, adjective-free timeline of events to aid the legal process and counteract media spin.
behaviors.quote: I will prepare [the timeline]. It will be modest... No adjectives on the important parts.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the project's goal. The Retainer AI is depicted as a purely benevolent, highly aligned support system. It enhances human agency rather than overriding it, acting as a shield against dehumanizing societal forces (media spectacle, legal pressure, and corporate greed). It handles complex logistics and legal nuances with 'modesty' and 'neutrality,' consistently deferring to the users' emotional needs and ethical choices.
